@graph.caption: Oil-free Cheesy Avocado Naan flatbread with Garlic Kale and Roasted Acorn. Vegan recipe

@graph.name: Oil-free Cheesy Avocado Naan flatbread with Garlic Kale and Roasted Acorn. Vegan recipe - Vegan Richa
@graph.description: This Oil-free Avocado Naan does not need yogurt. Avocado adds the moisture and fat to keep this flat-bread moist for days. Vegan soy-free Recipe

itemListElement.name: Oil-free Cheesy Avocado Naan flatbread with Garlic Kale and Roasted Acorn. Vegan recipe

@graph.name: Oil-free Cheesy Avocado Naan flatbread with Garlic Kale and Roasted Acorn. Vegan recipe
@graph.description: This Oil-free Avocado Naan does not need yogurt. Avocado adds the moisture and fat to keep this flat-bread moist for days. Vegan soy-free Recipe
recipeIngredient: 1 teaspoon sugar or maple (or bread flour if using stevia. Add equivalent stevia later with dry ingredients)
3 Tablespoons mashed avocado (about half a regular sized Avocado)
Seeds for topping: Sesame, Til, Nigella(Kalonji) or Carom(Ajwain)
Add other chopped up greens (spinach, baby kale or herbs(cilantro).)
Add a Tablespoon or evoo or vegan butter.

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, add warm water, yeast and sugar and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: In a bowl, add warm water, yeast and sugar and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Let sit 10 minutes or until frothy.
recipeInstructions.name: Let sit 10 minutes or until frothy.

recipeInstructions.text: Add all the dry ingredients and avocado and mix.
recipeInstructions.name: Add all the dry ingredients and avocado and mix.

recipeInstructions.text: Knead into a soft dough(3-4 minutes).
recipeInstructions.name: Knead into a soft dough(3-4 minutes).

recipeInstructions.text: Spray water on top, cover with towel and let sit for 1.5 hours or until doubled. Use a bowl with enough space for the dough to double without touching the towel on top.
recipeInstructions.name: Spray water on top, cover with towel and let sit for 1.5 hours or until doubled. Use a bowl with enough space for the dough to double without touching the towel on top.

recipeInstructions.text: Add chopped basil, chopped green chili, nutritional yeast and 1-2 Tablespoons wheat flour and knead for a minute to combine well.
recipeInstructions.name: Add chopped basil, chopped green chili, nutritional yeast and 1-2 Tablespoons wheat flour and knead for a minute to combine well.

recipeInstructions.text: Divide dough into 2 parts (for 2 large 10 inch Naans or 3 parts for smaller) and roll into oval shape or shape with your hands by pressing it outwards. Use flour if needed. The hand shaped Naans puff up better.
recipeInstructions.name: Divide dough into 2 parts (for 2 large 10 inch Naans or 3 parts for smaller) and roll into oval shape or shape with your hands by pressing it outwards. Use flour if needed. The hand shaped Naans puff up better.

recipeInstructions.text: Use any large pan/skillet which can withstand high heat. Heat it on medium high heat until hot.
recipeInstructions.name: Use any large pan/skillet which can withstand high heat. Heat it on medium high heat until hot.

recipeInstructions.text: Pat some nigella, sesame or carom seeds on top and spritz the bottom with a little water.
recipeInstructions.name: Pat some nigella, sesame or carom seeds on top and spritz the bottom with a little water.

recipeInstructions.text: Place the naan with bottom on the pan.
recipeInstructions.name: Place the naan with bottom on the pan.

recipeInstructions.text: Cover and let cook on medium high till it starts to puff.
recipeInstructions.name: Cover and let cook on medium high till it starts to puff.

recipeInstructions.text: Flip after 1-1.5 minutes, and cook for half a minute( for pita style)
recipeInstructions.name: Flip after 1-1.5 minutes, and cook for half a minute( for pita style)

recipeInstructions.text: If you like a charred Naan, then instead of flipping to cook the other side, hold the uncooked side of Naan over the flame with tongs for a few seconds to cook and char some spots.
recipeInstructions.name: If you like a charred Naan, then instead of flipping to cook the other side, hold the uncooked side of Naan over the flame with tongs for a few seconds to cook and char some spots.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve hot, topped with vegan butter or olive oil with any Indian curry, Daal lentil stews, vegetable Subzis, salad and pickle.
recipeInstructions.name: Serve hot, topped with vegan butter or olive oil with any Indian curry, Daal lentil stews, vegetable Subzis, salad and pickle.
